member.name: P:Saltworks.SaltMiner.Ui.Api.Models.UiApiConfig.UiBaseUrl
member.summary: Don't reference this directly, use BaseContext.UiBaseUrl instead
member.remarks: Shouldn't need to set this unless exceptional circumstances (i.e. UI is separated from UI API).
